helpers Package¶

raw_endpoint Module¶

Various helper functions used by the raw endpoint

scinet.helpers.raw_endpoint.get_id()[source]¶

Generates BSON ObjectID

Returns:Unique ObjectID hex
scinet.helpers.raw_endpoint.store_json_to_file(contents, filename)[source]¶

Stores a JSON to local storage

Parameters:
  • contents – Contents of JSON to be stored
  • filename – Filename contents will be saved to
